title: We're Alive: A Story of Survival, Season 2
description: Season Two of this action-packed Audio Drama plunges listeners back into a ravaged world of violence and terror. Who can survive in a world overrun by zombies? This Audio MP3CD edition presents Season Two of the exciting award-winning Audio-Drama Serial We're Alive by Kc Wayland and Shane Salk, and it is performed by a full cast.The hope of a better life forces the survivors of the tower out into the dissolving world around them. The consequences of past battles leave them struggling not only with each other but the remaining fragments of humanity.
author: K.C. Wayland
